intro: Drosanthemum godmaniae, commonly known as the Godman's ice plant, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, which is characterized by its succulent leaves and showy flowers. The plant produces small, star-shaped flowers in shades of yellow and orange, typically blooming in spring. Its fleshy, water-storing leaves help it survive in arid environments. Drosanthemum godmaniae is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and drought tolerance.
